website_summaries.verdict: With 12 different colors, the Yogree 2-brick set of EVA foam with beveled edge yoga blocks offers something for everyone.
cons: Some yogis find the surface to be too soft and squishy
A few have arrived with visible damage

customer_reviews.title: Not your average use-case for this product, but perfect for the use, none-the-less.
customer_reviews.text: While looking for high density foam studio monitor isolation pads, I noticed a trend of too-short, high priced foam pads that just didn't seem to fit my need to add some height to my monitors while also isolating them to a certain extent. So, I began to do some searching for "high density foam" here on Amazon, and I came across these incredibly priced, perfect foam bricks to place my large, heavy studio monitors (speakers) on, and these things do not disappoint! They're perfect in every regard for this sort of usage. I got the height that I needed as well as the isolation in spades, and the price was reasonable to boot. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: alphamachina

customer_reviews.title: Good price, too squishy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a yoga class I teach. Good value. I don't like them as they're too 'squishy' and not as supportive as others I've purchased. It also means they won't last as long with as much use they get in a classroom setting. If you're buying just for yourself and don't need hard blocks, they're fine. Nice color selection and arrived in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: These work well for me to make stretching safer and more comfortable. Sturdy with enough cushioning even when pressing hard. They are not intimidated by my 200 lb. frame. The size gives lots of options for use to get a little more out of a stretch or not risk tipping over in a painful position. The blocks are very stable so you won't feel afraid of them collapsing or falling over unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged, and I was reactive in immediately posting a poor review. Yogree reached out to me and sent new blocks. Thank you, Yogree for accommodating your customers. I am a very happy yogi, and the products are perfect! I sincerely recommend them; they're way better than the gym blocks!
customer_reviews.author: Yanet Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great for speaker stands!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a speaker stand for my JBL LSR-305's as recommended on Reddit. I was originally going to go with the Amazon Basics one, but since they went up in price, I began looking for alternatives and settled with these instead. These work phenomenally as speaker stands, and if you set it up upside-down, you don't even see the Yogree logo which is great for a nice aesthetic. I'm very glad I went with this yoga block! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my wife. She used them at her Yoga class and is very pleased with the quality. So am I. there was no odor after opening the package as mentioned on some other comments. They seem to be of high quality. Can't say how they will hold up but right now they appear to be a great value.
customer_reviews.author: dbld

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I'm just getting back into yoga and my flexibility isn't what it used to be, but these blocks really help me to get the necessary stretch and benefit of the movements without injuring myself. Price is great and I love the purple color!
customer_reviews.author: BBQ222

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay more.  This is as good as the bricks in yoga studios
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done. It's great. I don't know why I didn't buy one sooner. Highly recommend. I don't see any difference between this one and any other yoga brick I've ever used ever. Fantastic deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bourne

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, complimentary colored yoga block
customer_reviews.text: What I liked: The color was true to the site and the block was an appropriate firmness with a soft velvety feel. I bought it for my mom because she likes the block that I have now (not the same brand) and this was a great match. I bought the thicker (4in) version for multipurpose yoga uses (sitting, propping, cushioning). She is 5'7" and it's a great size for her. What I disliked: I wish it came in more colors! It only comes in 4 hades of teal, purple, and black. Would I buy again: Yes!
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong yoga block
customer_reviews.text: This yoga block is extremely sturdy. I don't know how one of the other reviewers said it compressed under their weight. My 180 lb husband used it just fine, with no compression of the block at all. He even put it under his lower back during the bridge pose and it's still stayed completely sturdy and strong. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: amymarie

customer_reviews.title: affordable, firm, just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes these very much. They are the same as the ones she uses in her dance class, but perhaps just slightly firmer, which she likes. They are perfect for what she is using them for (working on doing the splits and similar stretches, helping her to maintain correct form when she otherwise couldn't reach the floor in good posture.) The seem well made, and don't have much of a plastic/rubber/foam smell... the most affordable option we could find and seem just as good as more expensive choices. We got a 2 pk of the 9 x 6 x 4 in sort of a teal or turquoise color.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G. Gillmore

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lavender color of these blocks! They are so much less harsh than black or grey ones, so they allow me to keep the aesthetic of my yoga area. They are also very sturdy and hold up to me standing and leaning on them. They are helpful for deepening certain poses and stretches, as well as providing balance on poses you're working towards. A great addition to anyone's yoga practice!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Using for headphone stands
customer_reviews.text: I have a few pairs of headphones and these are excellent for stands and cheaper than the wood or metal ones. The size is good for most although for some they will compress the ear cushions. These feel sturdy enough for exercise although I have not used them for that.
customer_reviews.author: pablo

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. On the soft side.
customer_reviews.text: 1. Cheaply made: arrived with existing dents in the foam. 2. On the soft side: I was looking for harder foam blocks one can step on - not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: Ok, so I don't do yoga,  but...
customer_reviews.text: I DO play D&D. What, you ask, does D&D have to do with yoga blocks? Just this: I use a 40" TV, laying flat, showing appropriate images, as a battle map. I use four of these yoga blocks to place under the TV to support it and give it some padding. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: More than Meets the Eye
customer_reviews.text: For a yoga block, I suppose it works just fine, but I don't use it for that. I added some Velco hooks to one of the small edges to hold it in place because it makes for an awesome headphones holder. I purchased 3.
customer_reviews.author: MagePro

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Fire Yoga Flame!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Price is right, quality is good. A nice set of yoga blocks. Trying to do more Yoga in 2018. My wife said we should really be using Yoga Blocks to help get further into our stretches. So of course... Amazon app.... Yoga Blocks... These looked good for the price. They arrived and they are perfect. Nice and dense but light weight. They fit the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: The Chupacabra

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Hard enough for support but at the same time they have a nice soft structure that is pleasant to the touch. They're great for resting your back on them too if you spend a lot of time in front of your computer and have back pains at the end of the day. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Very firm, can stand on one easily. I've been using them as foot rests for 6 months, they're great. Mine get nicked a lot but it's just cosmetic - this would probably not happen if you're actually using them for yoga.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Supportive
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga blocks they support me in maintaining postures that are difficult. They are sturdy, which makes me feel safe and the color matches my yoga mat perfectly. They work so well for me that I purchased 2 sets for my hubby. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: WendyD

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, however a bit too soft for my liking. I’m only 120 pounds but there are dents after I put all my weight on them in certain poses. It quickly gets it form back.
customer_reviews.author: Katya N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my yoga practice. I enjoy having my own equipment rather than borrowing the blocks and straps that the yoga studio provides. Bought this at the same time I purchased the Waccess D-Ring Cotton Strap in a similar color. Good quality, sturdy yoga blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Risa A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this blocks
customer_reviews.text: I love this blocks. It is very handy in my Yoga class. Now, I don't have to worry about falling and hurting myself during the workout. These blocks are sturdy and well made so that we can hold them while working out especially during stretching postures helps me a lot. I carry them to my yoga class and love working with these blocks. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Freeda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, love the color.
customer_reviews.text: The yoga blocks arrived quickly and have been great to have at home for my yin yoga practices. They feel exactly the same to me as the blocks available at my yoga studio and the fun color is a great bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They're sturdy enough to support body weight for a bunch of different positions, but have just enough give that they don't hurt your back in arch pose, and your hands don't hurt pressing into them.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay more than 6 dollars for it. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay more than 6 dollars for it. It's about on par with what I got at the 5 dollar store. It's durable and supports my fat ass without caving under the weight. Barely leaves fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: V.C.

customer_reviews.title: As expected; good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected; good firmness, correct size. Use them multiple times each week in my classes and even though I have only had them a couple of weeks they are holding up well. Recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got what I paid for. Light weight yet sturdy. Dries quickly (which I didn't think I would have to care about but I do lol). Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: The blocks are very lightweight yet they will support your pose. You can sit on them, rest your hands on them, whatever, they seem to hold up very well. And I love the purple color, it matches my mat!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Van Cleave

customer_reviews.title: Using for higher level shooting rest....
customer_reviews.text: Using it to support shooting blocks, not accurately what it was meant for. Light weight, non-compressible. Great to raise up my shooting rest to a higher level.
customer_reviews.author: la griffith

customer_reviews.title: A different application
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to glue together to make lightweight steps for my cat to reach the benches in my RV. They made a lightweight set of steps that are easily moved and cleaned -- Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these blocks for months, they’re still holding up great and are exactly what I needed for my practice! Who says you need expensive, fancy blocks. If you’re a yogi on a budget, these will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mastrobuono

customer_reviews.title: What You Would Expect from Yoga Blocks
customer_reviews.text: Standard yoga blocks with the right denseness to them, neither too hard or too soft. Hence, comfortable to use and provides needed support, without changing your angles.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality yoga blocks, and very inexpensive. They worked perfectly for yoga, they hold me up just like they should on those crazy looking yoga moves.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are very lightweight, and they work very well. I like to use them sometimes instead of my cork yoga blocks. They seem very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Good quality yoga blocks
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice yoga blocks. Nothing fancy or unusual, but they are sturdy and well made. Have had them for a few weeks and they're working well. I like the color a lot as well (The turquoise ones).
customer_reviews.author: CatM

customer_reviews.title: Used as a shooting block
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bench shooting. Foam shooting blocks using same materials cost 4x more and you get 2!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D

customer_reviews.title: Yoga block
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Lightweight and I like the color. Matches my yoga mat perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Inniss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory for Home Yoga Practice
customer_reviews.text: Have been trying to maximize home workouts and using blocks can really take your yoga practice to the next level. With so many streaming options, it is nice to be able to find affordable accessories for home use!
customer_reviews.author: Skidge76

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful yoga blocks! Extremely durable and works well when I use them for yoga!
customer_reviews.author: Gisellemommie

customer_reviews.title: As good as new after couple months
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a dancer. We be had them for long time and just as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Marta A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and solid, firm form. My wife and I both use them and after we tear them up with our 5-7 practices a week, we will buy another set. For the price, they are worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Yoga!
customer_reviews.text: These yoga blocks are made well and hold up to weight well. They improve your yoga game for those of use that have the flexibility of an iron giant.
customer_reviews.author: marcisaninja

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I tuck these under me at various places for long hold poses. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: SFfanboy

customer_reviews.title: These are good blocks
customer_reviews.text: I like these yoga blocks and they were a reasonable price. My cat loves to chew on them. That part is not great :(
customer_reviews.author: Christie Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: They weren't as sturdy as I prefer and my son was able to bite a chunk out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for floor work!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. They are definitely firm enough. Love doing L sit holds using these!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Goins

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good price, nice color, sturdy, all around a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, I recently started practicing yoga and these have been great. Easy to store and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: These feel sturdy and solid. I've used them a few times but am sorry happy with them. Plus the gray is nice
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perlin

customer_reviews.title: Streach
customer_reviews.text: Yogree Yoga Blocks are an excellent , high quality product that I would highly recommend to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Finely

customer_reviews.title: nice idea
customer_reviews.text: These work well for props but don't ever try to put them under you and slide--as you need to do for some positions. They do not slide!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! They’re the same quality as the ones at the yoga studio, and I’ve really enjoyed using them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few of my exercises and they are great and easy for children to use as young as ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm an Acrobatic teacher and we use these in class for a few of my exercises and they are great and easy for children to use as young as 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mattisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality and good value for the money. I use them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Tara F.

customer_reviews.title: More firm than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was a bit worried about foam yoga blocks as opposed to wooden ones. I thought they'd leave imprints from me using my entire body weight but they are very firm but doesn't hurt to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Price, good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are liighter then my previous blocks,I carry four of them,so these new blocks are much easy to carry. The high density material provides a solid platform for balance exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Vaccaro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Like using props like these for yoga
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Like using props like these for yoga. Very helpful when working on flexibility and balance.
customer_reviews.author: BABS

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and perfect to use with yoga exercises
customer_reviews.text: Bricks are exactly as advertised - made of high density foam, very sturdy and perfect to use with yoga exercises. Amazing product and cheaper than most items on the market!
customer_reviews.author: B Shteyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality+price is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just like at yoga, for at home.... high quality for price
customer_reviews.author: tattoochik

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for- dense block with some give, and at a great price. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison L. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: As you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Great blocks slightly padded but solid still. Over all good blocks for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, good quality and cute color options.
customer_reviews.text: Love these blocks. Perfect for yoga, lightweight, good quality and cute color options.
customer_reviews.author: AReilly

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga block
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a weird smell out of the package and worked well. In terms of firmness, these are very similar to the yoga blocks I've used at other gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: They seem great. Very sturdy and lightweight. However upon opening the box there were huge gouges in one of the blocks that definitely did not happen from my opening the box. Very disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Madde

customer_reviews.title: good price value for two
customer_reviews.text: nothing so special. But it is a good bundle of two for the price. if you are sensitive to smells, it might bother you at first. let is air out and it will slowly disappear.
customer_reviews.author: clinton barr

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: good value for money, but a little soft and too light weight, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ela Moisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for any yoga pose. I am a beginner and I noticed that the block was incredibly sturdy and helped me refine my poses.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my studio classes and personal home use. They are exactly as they look and are not cheap feeling. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: kaili

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for yoga
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They have just a little give in them that help with pressure when using wrists
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: the best for the price
customer_reviews.text: great density without being too hard especially when go back over the blocks and perfect width
customer_reviews.author: lee hall

customer_reviews.title: Item came quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for stretching exercises and with yoga. I am pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So these guys get the job done and they have a great variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: These are my first yoga blocks so I am not sure exactly what to expect or what to look for. The color is lovely and these blocks definitely serve their purpose! Because I am typically on a yoga mat on carpet, it can be a little wobbly when standing with both feet on them; however, it certainly helps me focus on balance! So these guys get the job done and they have a great variety of colors. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: cheap but quality product
customer_reviews.text: These are sure to hold your weight and essentially weigh nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 2 pack, good quality and serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect yoga block.
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to write about these blocks, they do what they are supposed to and they come at a great price with cool colors to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The blocks are soft, yet sturdy. They offer me the support I need during yoga class. Love the price and love the blocks!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great blocks
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality blocks. Love the color. Shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: LadyInVa

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product and will keep them all
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I was confused as to whether an order was 1 or 2 blocks. As a result I ordered two pieces and ended up with 4 blocks. I am happy with the product and will keep them all.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for a beginner like myself. Lightweight, sturdy, durable, and at a good price. I have nothing to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Yoga blocks and at the right price. Delivered exactly as promised. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Stengel

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I love these stretching blocks, they seem even more durable than the ones they supply in my flexibility class. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Brick is a Good Brick is a Brick
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice and solid yet soft to touch BRICK - just as it is supposed to be. Best price. No need to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Jbyz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and super firm high density foam makes this a 5 star item in my book!
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These blocks have soft texture but are very solid. They work as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Surprised

customer_reviews.title: Good support.
customer_reviews.text: Great support blocks. They have a bit of give and compression which keeps them soft but still plenty of support.
customer_reviews.author: D'Anemone

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality blocks
customer_reviews.text: Great, high quality blocks. I use them more or less every day as part of my practice, and they are the perfect balance of dense and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably firm, but not really good for heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: These come as a pair of blocks. They are firm, but not as firm as cork or as firm as the Gaiam Durablocks -- there is definitely some give when you put significant weight on them. I found them inadequate for my practice and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Rex

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: You can use then for just about anything in yoga or exercise
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sturdiness and how lightweight these are! Couldn't be better!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this to help clients stretch, the block is sturdy & I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great set of yoga blocks!
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy set of blocks. Color is exactly as shown and they feel like they'll last me quite a long time with regular use. Very pleased with my purchase! Thanks, y'all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight soft blocks
customer_reviews.text: These blocks are super light and feel great in your hands. They are soft to touch and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased; highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I use them with my MuTu program. Love having two...I keep one upstairs and one downstairs. They withstand all my weight, stay in place, and are nice and sturdy. Great value and quality...would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice
customer_reviews.text: I need these for balance, they are well made .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer

customer_reviews.title: great size at a great price
customer_reviews.text: love the muted black color and the size is perfect...
customer_reviews.author: bluesundown

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Light
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and was really happy with it, so bought 2 more for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable, comfortable and supportive product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. They're the same blocks used in my yoga class and I'm very pleased with their comfortable yet sturdy form.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these blocks
customer_reviews.text: Fun color and exactly as described. these have really helped me into a few yoga positions.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi B

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Nice Color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had yoga blocks before since I’m new to it, but these are great! They support my 185 pound body, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Howard Finney

product_meta.title: yogree Yoga Blocks, 9"x6"x4" - High Density EVA Foam Brick Provides Stability Balance & Support, Improve Strength and Deepen Poses - Great for Yoga, Pilates, Workout, Fitness & Gym
feature_bullets: Measuring 9 x 6x 4 inches, made of high-density and sturdy EVA foam for long-lasting durability.
Featuring beveled edges for soft, firm and easy griping! Lightweight and Non-slip even sweat.
Make difficult yoga poses accessible to beginners and those with injuries or physical limitations.
Moisture-proof to avoid growing bacteria! Cleans easily with a little soap or detergent to wash away the odors.
Easy to travel, perfect for at home use and in the studio.
